April Newsletter

“Taking more people to the golf clubs, to the game, is what the PGA wants to drive forward and PGA CityGolf will help do that”

Sandy Jones, Chief Executive of
The Professional Golfers’ Association.

 PGA City Golf is a specialist and unique marketing organisation providing new and invaluable business for Golf Clubs across the UK. With over 6 years experience in the corporate golf market, PGA City Golf has found a solution that meets the needs of the golfer, the golf club and the club pro.

Most golf clubs around the UK are busy on Friday afternoons and on Saturday and Sunday mornings. At all other times it can be said that most clubs are deserted or virtually empty. A golf club’s biggest asset surely has to be the course itself. To attract new members and keep existing members happy, the course needs to be both well maintained and stimulating to play. This in itself represents the biggest cost to a golf club owner.

If the golf course is empty during off peak times than the same can be said for the Bar, Restaurant, Conferencing, Hotel and Leisure facilities. By using PGA City Golf, our partnership golf clubs attract “corporate golfers” that would not have visited the club otherwise.

More importantly, these corporate clients are visiting the club on a regular basis and entertaining their key clients on the course, in the bar and the restaurant. In addition, many of our corporate clients use the clubhouse for business meetings and conferencing unlike the “one off” golfer who visits through traditional 2 for 1 voucher schemes.

           
WOOLSTON MANOR Golf & Country Club, Essex
Every now and then a golf club is born that possesses a little something that separates it from the competition and Woolston Manor is no exception.

One is initially welcomed to the complex with lavish gates and a heartwarming Union Jack Flag. Follow the winding driveway alongside the 18th fairway down the hill for your first taste of the impressive Clubhouse.

Click here for more >> 		 
RUSHMERE Golf Club, Suffolk
A recent addition to Great Britain's prestigious list of Centurion Golf Clubs, Rushmere has every proud characteristic of a club celebrating its letter from the Queen.

A mile or two northwest of Ipswich town centre Rushmere Golf Club is steeped in history and tradition. The simple, yet effective, course layout hasn't changed for ¾ of a century and the time-honoured values of our forefathers are evident throughout this classic British golf club.

Click here for more >> 		 
TEWKESBURY PARK HOTEL, G & CC, Gloucestershire
Perched high upon the rolling Gloucestershire countryside, Tewkesbury Park Hotel, Golf and Country Club has recently celebrated its 30th birthday by teaming up with PGA CityGolf.

A Championship length 18-hole golf course is complemented by a 6-hole academy course, driving range and short game area whilst the Country Club has every other amenity you could ask for too...
